document.full_text: libyan leader muammar gaddafi's forces have sown land mines in areas around the city of ajdabiyah, adding a dangerous new element to the war on the eastern front, human rights and mine experts said on thursday.
document.title: gaddafi forces sow landmines in east libya
lines_and_colors: libyan leader muammar gaddafi's forces have sown land mines in areas around the city of ajdabiyah, adding a dangerous new element to the war on the eastern front, human rights and mine experts said on thursday.
